title: An integrated Janus hydrogel with different hydrophilicities and gradient pore structures for high-performance zinc-ion batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,4126-4136
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01018C, Paper
Kaiyue Zhu, Xiling Niu, Weili Xie, Hanmiao Yang, Weikang Jiang, Manxia Ma, Weishen Yang
A pioneering achievement is made in developing integrated Janus hydrogel electrolytes featuring gradient pores in cross-section and varying hydrophilicities on surfaces. This novel hydrogel enables Zn-ion batteries to exhibit excellent performance.
